VIVIDUS-005.assertionPattern: .*Expected: number of elements is a value equal to <8> Actual: <6>.*
VIVIDUS-005.scenarioPattern: .*Verify that allows changing number of items on page.*
VIVIDUS-005.stepPattern: Then number of elements found by `xpath\(//div\[@class='product-grid'\]//div\[contains\(@class, 'item-box'\)\]\)` is = `8`
VIVIDUS-005.description: The product grid does not update correctly to show the expected number of items when selecting different values from the dropdown.
